name: MarqVision
long_description: We are building the IP infrastructure for global brands and marketplaces to manage all their IP operations –from creating, managing, protecting and licensing IPs – in one unified platform. With IP protection, we help brands take down counterfeits from 1,500 online marketplaces worldwide. With IP creation, we help brands register trademarks in 120 countries with a click of a button. Founded by Harvard Law Students and backed by Softbank, DST Global and Y Combinator, MarqVision raised a $20 million Series A round in June 2022.
one_liner: MarqVision builds an IP Operating System in a digital economy
